00025 #include "OgreWin32ConfigDialog.h"
00026 #include "OgreWin32ErrorDialog.h"
00027 #include "OgreWin32Input.h"
00028 #include "OgreRoot.h"
00029 #include "OgreLogManager.h"
00030 
00031 namespace Ogre {
00032 
00033 #ifdef DEBUG
00034     int g_iCreatedConfigDiag = 0;
00035     int g_iCreatedErrorDiag = 0;
00036     int g_iCreatedRenderWindow = 0;
00037     int g_iCreatedInputReader = 0;
00038 #endif
00039 
00041     extern "C" void createPlatformConfigDialog(ConfigDialog** ppDlg)
00042     {
00043         // Must get HISTANCE
00044         HINSTANCE hInst = GetModuleHandle("OgrePlatform.dll");
00045         *ppDlg = new Win32ConfigDialog(hInst);
00046 
00047 #ifdef DEBUG
00048         g_iCreatedConfigDiag++;
00049 #endif
00050     }
00051 
00053     extern "C" void createPlatformErrorDialog(ErrorDialog** ppDlg)
00054     {
00055         HINSTANCE hInst = GetModuleHandle("OgrePlatform.dll");
00056         *ppDlg = new Win32ErrorDialog(hInst);
00057 
00058 #ifdef DEBUG
00059         g_iCreatedErrorDiag++;
00060 #endif
00061     }
00062 
00063 
00065     extern "C" void createPlatformInputReader(InputReader** ppReader)
00066     {
00067         *ppReader = new Win32Input();
00068 
00069 #ifdef DEBUG
00070         g_iCreatedInputReader++;
00071 #endif
00072     }
00073 
00075     extern "C" void destroyPlatformConfigDialog(ConfigDialog* dlg)
00076     {
00077         delete dlg;
00078 
00079 #ifdef DEBUG
00080         g_iCreatedConfigDiag--;
00081 #endif
00082     }
00084     extern "C" void destroyPlatformErrorDialog(ErrorDialog* dlg)
00085     {
00086         delete dlg;
00087 
00088 #ifdef DEBUG
00089         g_iCreatedErrorDiag--;
00090 #endif
00091     }
00093     extern "C" void destroyPlatformRenderWindow(RenderWindow* wnd)
00094     {
00095         delete wnd;
00096 
00097 #ifdef DEBUG
00098         g_iCreatedRenderWindow--;
00099 #endif
00100     }
00102     extern "C" void destroyPlatformInputReader(InputReader* reader)
00103     {
00104         delete reader;
00105 
00106 #ifdef DEBUG
00107         g_iCreatedInputReader--;
00108 #endif
00109     }
00110 
00111 #ifdef DEBUG
00112     BOOL WINAPI DllMain( HINSTANCE hinstDLL,  // handle to DLL module
00113                          DWORD fdwReason,     // reason for calling function
00114                          LPVOID lpvReserved   // reserved
00115                        )
00116     {
00117         if( fdwReason == DLL_THREAD_DETACH ) {
00118             if( g_iCreatedConfigDiag )
00119                 LogManager::logMessage( "Memory Leak: Not all platform configuration dialogs were destroyed!!!", LML_CRITICAL );
00120             if( g_iCreatedConfigDiag )
00121                 LogManager::logMessage( "Memory Leak: Not all platform error dialogs were destroyed!!!", LML_CRITICAL );
00122             if( g_iCreatedConfigDiag )
00123                 LogManager::logMessage( "Memory Leak: Not all platform render windows were destroyed!!!", LML_CRITICAL );
00124             if( g_iCreatedConfigDiag )
00125                 LogManager::logMessage( "Memory Leak: Not all platform input readers were destroyed!!!", LML_CRITICAL );
00126         }
00127     }
00128 #endif
00129 }
